name: Civilization 4 Data File
summary: Learn about .FPK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Example Civilization IV art asset files include Art0.fpk, Assets0.fpk, Assets1.fpk, Assets2.fpk, and Assets3.fpk.
NOTE: FPK files are also used by Sid Meier's Pirates.

description: Game assets file used by Sid Meier's Civilization IV, a turn-based strategy game; saves art data for game graphics; stored in the Civilization IV\​Assets\​ installation directory; can be extracted using PakBuild for Windows or Macapaka for Mac.
